website_summaries.verdict: These cute, mini speakers sound almost as good as they look.
pros: Bass is good for a small speaker
Connects to any Bluetooth capable device
Selfie feature remotely activates camera for still shots and video
Rechargeable lithium ion battery provides three hours of playback
cons: Doesn't pair well with 7th generation iPod Nano

customer_reviews.title: Unbelieveable
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant innovative Bluetooth. I was skeptical but am blown away by this great device. I will be surprising my mother with one for Christmas. She loves her worship music! I've already received two emails from the family owned business acknowledging my purchase. They are definitely customer service conscious.
customer_reviews.author: brwnigrl

customer_reviews.title: Tiny speaker packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: Been thinking about this and wasn't sure if I will get one. But got feedback from friends that the audio is way decent for its size. And that it's loud. So finally bought it. And have no regrets! So cute, easy to pair and it is a mini me of my cat! So awesome! The sound quality is so much better than I expected. I bought this full price. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when i connect it to my iPhone i lose the ...
customer_reviews.text: when i connect it to my iPhone i lose the ability to use my iPhone for other tasks. I wanted to be able to play music for my daughter through this speaker while I use my phone for directions without music blasting at me. but once connected I cannot send texts i cannot search the internet. the battery went down so quickly (2-3 hours). we stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: august

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one (the dog) for my husband for his birthday. We loved it so much that I bought myself one (the cat). These are super easy to pair and work excellently. The only drawback we found is we can't use our keyboard functions while it's paired up. Otherwise the speakers are great, the microphone works perfectly for hands free use, and the camera functions easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had very low expectations for this tiny speaker. At best, I thought it would give my daughter a cute novelty gift. She loves pandas. But when we got it and connected it with Bluetooth to her phone, and started playing music... I was shocked at how good the sound quality is! Even at high volume. It's also very loud for a tiny little thing. My daughter absolutely loves it! I can't say enough good things about it. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a small, wireless speaker. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie B Comics

customer_reviews.title: Check out my little friend
customer_reviews.text: OMG my little pet is not only adorable it's loud. This blue tooth speaker is very easy to install. It also has some great features like listening to phone calls thru your speakers and selfie hookup, I haven't tried that yet. But if it's anything like the speaker sound and phone connection I can only imagine it will work just fine as well. I took it to work and my coworkers were extremely surprised at the sound and how cute my pet is they now want to order one. Thank you JAKAB for your wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Williams

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING sound from a TINY, funny CHEAP and convinient speaker
customer_reviews.text: These things are not only hilarious, they are REALLY loud and have reasonable sound for the money. I have taken these and put them on a picnic table, outdoors and easily hear clear sound 30 feet away. They are really, really portable and cool to use. Considering how much $$$ money I have paid for fancy, bulky, high Fidelity Bluetooth speakers, and never use them because they are inconvenient, this thing can be in your pocket or Keychain and never miss a beat. Turn it down! They are really awesome!!!! MUST buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eshopperaholic

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the EchoDot for my hubby and he's like, "Oh cool"
customer_reviews.text: So, yeah, I purchased the EchoDot for my hubby and he's like, "Oh cool"! Then I pulled out my audio pets (panda, dog, bear) so I can show him what I bought for my nieces and nephew for Christmas. Well, he went absolutely GAGA over them! So much so that he went home with the dog! The volume, clarity and the cuteness of these little things exceeded my expectations. Not only did I had to purchase another dog, but I also bought a panda for myself as well. They were just too darn cute to pass up! PS 2 weeks later hubby still has not turned on the Dot.
customer_reviews.author: Moy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with iPod Nano!  Otherwise a sweet little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use wth his iPod Nano he got for Christmas. Turns out this speaker works with pretty much every other bluetooth source on the planet except the Nano. So, no speaker for my son. The upside is it does have great sound and easily paired with both my husband's iPhone 7 and my 6. We're keeping it to use on the golf cart and craft room, and it's back to the drawing board for my son. In AudioPet's defense, their company website does say it might not work with the Nano, but I didn't find that until after we started having problems. My bad for relying just on Amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: Simple connection but drops out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the panda. It pretty much has to be constantly plugged in so it is ready to use again. It is easy to use and to connect with bluetooth. Simple instructions. These steps have to be repeated. I had high expectations after seeing the other reviews. It seems to work with music most of the time but drops out with videos and talks. I would have returned it but after opening it, I overly confidently tossed out the box along with the short USB it came with since a longer USB I already had was able to charge it. Though it is so cute, I am disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Guy&GalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: So cute yet such big sound! Easy to set up. Bought this after seeing it on Oprah's "Favorite Thing's" and then reading all the great reviews. Had it delivered to the Amazon locker at my office and immediately set it up at my desk. My co-workers and I were amazed at the sound quality. We've been enjoying Christmas Carols for the past 2 weeks, thanks to "Pandamonium Panda".
customer_reviews.author: ej stein

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little doubtful about the quality of sound, but was pleasantly surprised. I keep my Audio Pet on my desk and it is a good alternative for my Bose speaker, which is much larger. While the sound quality is not quite the same, I haven't been disappointed. I've had it for less than a week, but so far, so good. The packaging and instructions were excellent. I was able to log on easily to the website to be sure about the setup and recharging. I was easily able to recharge it once. I may order and pair up another to get a more stereo affect. Pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't play well with other pets
customer_reviews.text: Well, not all Audio Pets are alike. Couldn't the monkey this up with another Audio Pet (Dragon). Yes, I could pair the dragon with a third but never to the monkey. That was the reason I bought a second speaker so....epic fail. As for the speaker-works well, sounds good and, when you can, paring two of them makes them sound even better. There seems to be a difference in versions of the same speaker that might account for the incompatibility, BTW
customer_reviews.author: George Pelech

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST MINI SPEAKER EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little guys, this makes the 5th time I've purchased an audio pet. They make great gifts! They are a little bigger than an eos lip balm yet have more sound at better quality then some larger bluetooth speakers I've tried, the battery even seems to last longer too. Super portable and can go with you anywhere easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great volume & phone charger will also work if your in a pinch 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I love the little guy, great volume, adorable size, so cute, but the charge cord will not plug into it, i had a few others try but I didn't want to break it. Thank goodness my phone charger works or I could have only used him one night. I always have to go lay down in my bed for a few hours a day to watch my programs on my tablet (Bad back). Now I can actually here it. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Judy Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Love my new pug!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used my new Pug speaker once, so far. I was completely shocked by the volume! I didn't think something so very small could emit enough volume to be heard from very far away. I can turn the volume all the way up in my phone and hear it throughout most of my 2,000 sqft home! I'm obviously not worried about incredible sound quality, but this speaker definitely surprised me in a good way. I am very pleased, and am considering getting another one! Photographed with one of my other pugs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Great Sound in a Small Package.
customer_reviews.text: Too cute for words, plus the sound coming from such an adorable speaker. Perfect timing with the holidays coming. Great stocking stuffer, but don't wait for Christmas they may sell out once you see how cute they are and how good the sound is.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: PAIRING 2 AUDIOPETS
customer_reviews.text: If you want to pair 2 pets make sure that you get the same model. I could not pair a 4.2 model with a 5.0 model and did not see any model numbers on the packages they came in to realize there might be a problem. The seller very graciously answered my inquiry and helped solve the issue. I do like the sound quality and the amount of bass that comes through. Nice speakers.
customer_reviews.author: very blessed

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 13 yr old daughter and she looooooves it! The sound was surprisingly good and her older brother often uses it when she isn't around. He takes it when he goes skating and she always has it when she goes bike riding. He is 18 and wants his own now lol
customer_reviews.author: RB6

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound out of such a small, compact design!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is awesome! I got this to take to the beach and have decent quality music to listen to, and this Audio Pet has exceeded my expectations. The sound is great and loud enough to be heard clearly over the wind and the crashing waves. It is so small and easy to take along, and packing as light as possible is key when going to the beach with kiddos. It is super easy to connect with my phone and then it is instant entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness itself!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit it, my children are adults, I have no grandchildren, I bought this for myself. My Audio Pet Minis are a burst of sound in a cute little package. It would be perfect for any music loving child...or adult. My daughter saw it and said, "Y'know, Mom, my birthday's coming up and the unicorn one is so cute. AWWW, so is the pug dog!" I'm thinking there may be one hanging from a birthday gift and maybe one in her Christmas stocking this year.
customer_reviews.author: E Marziano

customer_reviews.title: Such Big Sound in a Little Package
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these little jewels that I have bought. I take them to the beach with me every year and people always ask where the radio is coming from. I show them this little speaker and they are amazed how big and rich the sound is coming from such a small package.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I got my first speaker as a gift. Unfortunately I went kayaking and had hooked it to the life jacket and forgot it. I missed this little speaker so much had to buy another one. I love the variety of animals that are offered also. I can not imagine anyone not finding a use for these little guys. Would highly recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from a little speaker. I purchased it to use with my granddaughters chrome book she does school on now. Wow I was so surprised at the sound quality and volume. I am going to buy more. SO CUTE
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: Cute and loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for travel. The sound is quite good considering its so small and cheap (price not quality). I cannot attest to battery life since I just bought it. It will suit my needs perfectly. Very cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: These are so adorable I could not pass them up
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable I could not pass them up. I love that they have a little string you can tie on anything and take around with you so you always have a speaker on the go. The sound quality is great. I have not played with the other features yet but just as a speaker its perfect. I was so in love with these little guys I bought a bunch to give out as Christmas presents. Now all my friends and family can play their tunes out loud. It is perfect for traveling as it does not take up much room and they look super cute sitting on your desk!
customer_reviews.author: Heather E. Walrod

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes being cute is enough
customer_reviews.text: Extreeeeemely adorable. As a speaker, I'm a little disappointed, it sounds kind of "underwater", but placing it right up next to a wall helps it sound better. I'm confused because in some of the reviews featuring videos on here it sounds awesome. It also works as a remote camera shutter, which I haven't tested. Battery life is about 6 hours. Comes with a lanyard for portability, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: ExLxMx

customer_reviews.title: Great sound/size/price package
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. It's small but has a great audio quality and range. I wouldn't change it for a expensive brand speaker, as this does the job more than efficiently. I have had it for at least 3 year now. I only had issues with connecting my old iphone because it detected it as speaker/keyboard, but with my samsung I was able to disable the keyboard portion and just have it as speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Vega

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Given & Received.
customer_reviews.text: I was given one of these speakers for Christmas and I was truly shocked at the amazing product I was gifted. Not only is it easy to use, there is no hassle transporting it anywhere. The sound that comes out of such a small $25 speaker is absolutely incredible. I was so impressed with this product that I purchased one for my sister for her birthday. It arrived today, 4 days before expected. Will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Powerfully loud!
customer_reviews.text: These cute little guys (I own three) are forces to be reckoned with! Even my husband asked for one. It's easy to use, easy to pair with a mobile, adorable and loud as heck. I can't speak for longevity as our first one is one three months old and not used as much as our newest two, but I hope they'll be good for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jai V

customer_reviews.title: Little Dude Packs a Punch!
customer_reviews.text: This little dude sure packs a punch! I had it playing on the counter during a party and no one could believe that all that sound was coming from a tiny, little fish speaker! Granted the bass isn't the best, but hello, this thing is only 2.5" high! I would definitely recommend this lil guy any time you need tunes; pool-side sipping on some beers, hanging out at home, or traveling; he makes the perfect companion!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: A Mini Magical and Mighty Audio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece's BD. She has a pug. I was not expecting it to be so super AWESOME. I can't believe how clear and crisp the sound is and then was totally surprised by the fact it takes pictures also. We took on her Birthday Wine Tour and had tons of fun listening to music and passing it around for photos. Loved it so much, bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: B. Locey

customer_reviews.title: My new beach speaker
customer_reviews.text: Best little speaker ever, sound quality is surprisingly great and volume is higher than expected. We take on our bike rides, beach trips, everywhere. My girls are alwAys fighting over who carries it so look like a second one is in our near future
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: ... my 8 year old daughter and she is in LOVE with it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 year old daughter and she is in LOVE with it. Don't let the size fool you, this little thing is SO loud I can hear her with it in any room in our house lol. It's awesome! It took a minute for her tablet to "find the Bluetooth" signal, but once we restarted both devices and searched again, we found it. You will not regret your purchase. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, and it is fantastic IF it is still
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really impressed. The sound is great, and it is fantastic IF it is still. And your phone is super close to it. But, if you have it hanging somewhere, or if your phone is moving around in the room. It crackles and carries on. I hoped for better. Oh well, it's super cute though
customer_reviews.author: Cat family

customer_reviews.title: little dog big bark!
customer_reviews.text: I took this out of the package and I laughed, you can hold it in the palm of your hand and close your entire fist its so small, I thought I had just wasted my money....UNTIL....I took it home, synced it with my phone and sat it on the deck of my pool....WOW...this little dog has one hell of a bark....great sound!! would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Harleygal

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong one in package :(
customer_reviews.text: Okay I really do love this speaker but the thing is I ordered the cat and got a pig. You can see in the picture the packaging tag says classical cat and not pig. It's just a tiny hang up because I'm going to buy another for a friend anyways... also the little guy has kind of grown on me :) Update: I keep him swinging on my belt at work(I stock groceries at a local king soopers) and he does his job well playing my music while I stack cans during my graveyard shifts!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a pre-teen/teen. Big sound, little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive sound from this tiny guy. My niece told me this was her favorite Christmas gift (age 12). Smaller than a fist, sound fills the room. Portable and easy to use. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Houston

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effective
customer_reviews.text: Louder and cleaner sounding than you'd think but if your looking for a miracle at this size and price then move along. There's been a lot of improvements in this size range from other brands but for more money. Buy it because it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 12-year-old niece and she loves it and uses it every day. She sings and plays flute so I know she uses it for school music as well as for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Brackbill

customer_reviews.title: Adore it!
customer_reviews.text: Adore this little speaker. Not only it’s super cute and light it also quite powerful. I’ve had it for a while and it’s been working great and the charge lasts quite a while . Might need to buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Anna D*

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker and sooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: My family couldn't believe that this tiny speaker had so much volume. I purchased two of them, one for me, and one for a White Elephant gift at Christmas! (it was a tiny dog)
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Love My Little Panda Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Cute speaker with good sound quality and battery life. It’s very powerful for such a small thing. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and clear
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute speaker it is small clear and mighty. I bought this and it’s used in two places a large class and a commercial kitchen works great in both places. It has a strap so you don’t misplace it I bought another one love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bacana

customer_reviews.title: My Audio Pet/ Cat
customer_reviews.text: This product came on time and in good shape. This was a gift for my 10 year old nephew who loves his I-pod, it's Bluetooth capable and for being so small sounds pretty good! It also has a connecter through the ear and can be attached to a back pack, pants etc. Very cute and great price.
customer_reviews.author: WendyDarling

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker! It's adorable! Maybe it's my inexperience, but the speaker wasn't detectable while it was connected to a device. I connected it to my iPhone, but then it wouldn't show up in my iPad list of Bluetooth devices. I had to disconnect it from the iPhone for it to show up in my iPad list. The speaker itself was very good for its size, and it being a pug... SO cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my best friend. She LOVED it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my best friend. She LOVED it. It's so cute and so tiny! It looks even cuter in person. It's not the best sound, which you'd expect--this is a fun gift, not a functional one. :) It charges quickly, it holds a charge very well, and it gets LOUD. Of course, the louder you turn it up, the more distorted the sound gets, but it's plenty loud enough to turn on and listen to music while you clean or something. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: The kids had a lot of fun with it and so did I
customer_reviews.text: This device is so cute and can get unexpectedly loud for such a small product. I purchased this item for $22 and hooked it up to my ipod Bluetooth. The kids had a lot of fun with it and so did I. The sound is clear and coherent, but don't expect a super bass sound or long range connection as in the more expensive wireless speakers. I was quite pleased with this product and will purchase this again for my nephews/friends.
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  little thing with a PUNCH!
customer_reviews.text: works great and the fact that it takes pictures was an added bonus. I can’t believe how much great quality sound comes out from such a tiny device. I’ve bought them is fun gifts for people and they just love them, highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: I love my new cute kitty speaker it actually looks like ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my new cute kitty speaker it actually looks like one of my cats I never thaught something so tiny could sound so clear and incredible I love it I'm making these cute little speakers everyone Christmas present this year
customer_reviews.author: Sk bird

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well in old houses
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well in my old house. Range was way less than the 20 feet . Going to return and it only lasts a few hours unplugged. The dying sound woke my 3 year old at 3am.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie DiFerdinando

customer_reviews.title: Pairing is AWFUL. Don't bother...
customer_reviews.text: I paired it, it worked until i turned it off. Now here are the stats: 75% won't connect 15% connects (no audio) 10% plays sound I have to go into Bluetooth settings everytime. EVERYTIME.
customer_reviews.author: Nessie the cryptid eating a crumpet

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly loud, but...
customer_reviews.text: Small, but potent! Only criticism is it registers to my tablet as a wireless keyboard so if I want to type something while using it, I have to disconnect it, type whatever, and then reconnect it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it and does not. She loves the sound quality and the portablity of it. But she doe not like that it doe not have a volume button on it and you cant turn it down even with her MP3 player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works pretty well, nice volume
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well, nice volume. I used it around the house so my kids listen to music. The only thing is that when I'm connected to it with my iPhone 7, for some reason the keyboard doesn't show. Other than that everything works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: themonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought two- one for a Christmas stocking stuffer and one for myself because they were so cute I couldn't resist. It was easy to get started up and is perfect for my desk at work. Definitely one of my favorite impulse purchases
customer_reviews.author: julia piper

customer_reviews.title: Way louder than expected
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is super cute and definitely packs some volume. I bought it to use at work and it is WAY to loud to use there, but it is great around the house. It's amazing how loud this little guy is and the sound is decent for such a low-priced speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kari D

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure I could have found a better one, but I bought her a Panda case ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as Christmas gift to go with my daughters iPod touch. This speaker is tiny!!!!! Does not hold a charge well. Not worth it. I'm sure I could have found a better one, but I bought her a Panda case to match!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Marie

customer_reviews.title: A +
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine turned me on this product so I ordered it from Amazon prime very pleased with the quality of this speaker it's unbelievable and I even took a phone call while playing music through this Bluetooth system, looking forward to music on the beach cruiser this summer
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mc

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is ADORABLE! It's smaller than expected (matchbox car small) even though several reviews said that! Big sound! I got it for my 2 year old grandson who loved to dance around with my phone in his hand! I like that he can't easily turn it on and off and that I can control the volume from my phone. My only complaint would be that the signal is not strong enough When we go outside but inside he can get a reasonable distance away from me.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Burke

customer_reviews.title: My fave little speakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers! I had one for a couple years, then it got eaten by my foster dog so of course I had to buy another. Perfect little speaker for taking to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Landrey White

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This little thing puts out some sound! And nicely blends in with my baby's outdoorsy themed room.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Aultman

customer_reviews.title: Dope!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend has the same speaker and I fell in love with is sound for such a small gadget. The base and sound is great, small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Bobadilla

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great Sound in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adorable speaker as a gift for a child. I played it for my husband, who is very selective about how his music sounds. He was amazed at how great the sound quality was, and said he is going to buy a some for his employees. My Audio Pet fits in the palm of my hand. They provide a strap you can attach, so it can be easily carried around. The bluetooth paired easily with my phone.This is a great value with many uses.
customer_reviews.author: KAL

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and mighty!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was gifted the unicorn a few years ago, I just bought the frog. Love these little speakers! Easy to use, super portable, and the sound is great for such tiny speakers! We use them for intimate gatherings, back porch sitting, and I love them for my audio books/podcast while doing housework! 🐸🦄
customer_reviews.author: Kate*

customer_reviews.title: This is super easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use and set up. The sound is excellent too. They also have fantastic customer service that respond quickly and will help you. My only tip is that make sure it is plugged in and you can see the red light. I thought it was plugged in several times but it actually wasn't, so I thought something was wrong with the battery. When I e-mailed the company they sent me a new one, but then I realized I just wasn't plugging it in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jay D Wickliff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter (age 2 1/2) and she loves it....carries it everywhere enjoying her tunes. Great sound. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Z

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little guy...not the best quality sound but small enough to carry around for a little background music
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: You just cannot believe the sound that comes out of this little head! I have a cat.
customer_reviews.author: ADEM T. THYNE

customer_reviews.title: This little dude rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER would have expected such a tiny speaker to produce such a loud, crisp sound, but he does and it’s amazing. I only reduce a star because his battery life honestly is pretty bad, but the quality of sound outweighs the con!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Marie

customer_reviews.title: Small, cute, powerful
customer_reviews.text: This blue tooth speaker is very cute, it is small but powerful. Plan on taking it on vacation with me this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Mahlman

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and work the money
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and fun to use and easy to figure out. I love that they will play sterio when you have two. The sounds is good, especially for something so small. I think I'll go back and buy some more of the styles.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: quality little speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are quality speakers! It’s my second one that I bought they make nice gifts and they sound great!! and people don’t believe that that sound is coming out of that little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Kalomba

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a little thing
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and connects fast. For a small item, it puts out some great sound. Not muffled at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a Bose but it is great for running around. It's fun and portable which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can not believe the sound that comes out of this teeny, tiny thing!
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe the sound that comes out of this teeny, tiny thing! This thing is about 2 1/2 inches is all. I was disappointed when it arrived because I was expecting it to be a little larger, but then when I heard the sound!!! And it turns out to be a nice size because it can hang off of anywhere- backpack, purse, etc. and not be too bulky,
customer_reviews.author: ShawnAndTiffany

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be bigger, like possibly 3”-4” tall. Only stands approx 2”. Not bad for a small speaker for my child, though has a lot of treble and sounds very tinny. Though, probably couldn’t expect much more for the size of the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Tiny device packs a lot of sound! Has a camera shutter that I have not tried, but a friend used it for a group family shot and loved it. Also works just like a blue tooth for talking on the phone. OK, so maybe I am the last person on Earth to know this, but it's fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t try to save money with the old generation
customer_reviews.text: This generation doesn’t have automatic shut-off so every time we go to use it, it’s dead from the last time we used it. Also, my toddler can mash the button in the bottom and make it very loud. He does not need control over volume. The newer generation is definitely worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is AMAZING! The sound quality is very clear and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is AMAZING! The sound quality is very clear and I can't believe how loud it can get! It's no bigger than kiwi or a ping pong ball so it's great for travel. It's so easy to use too! Charge it, sync the Bluetooth w any compatible device & turn on :) This is even better than those $100+ mini wireless speakers.. it's worth spending the $25 to try for yourself. I bought more for the kids In my family after I received one as a Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive speaker with good quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good speaker considering it’s relatively low price. It is most easily portable (it can fit into a pocket), attractive to look at, and provides enough sound to fill up an average family unit living space. I am quite satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality is pretty good for the price tag, it's about the same quality as a cell phone speaker but it can get much louder. I really like the camera feature that comes with this little thing, and the battery life last five hours. Plus it's so cute and it even feels soft. love this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Works best with Apple products
customer_reviews.text: Warning...these speakers work best if you have an Apple phone. Very problematic if using an android phone or tablet. The speaker is very cute and petite but was sad my husband couldn't use it with his pixel phone or android tablet. It was a gift for him which he can't use. The speaker tries to take over the keyboard and keeps scrolling and randomly changes settings. It was a fight to get music or a show to play. Works great though with our Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: LisaNC

customer_reviews.title: Buy this little nugget of a speaker!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great on my little panda and everyone who sees it wants it ! It's about the size of a large walnut and fits easily in a pocket or handbag without adding any weight at all. I will buy more for gifts. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: ... cute and has held up over the past year beautifully. I use it to play music in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is so cute and has held up over the past year beautifully. I use it to play music in the mornings, as well as for my church lessons -- he's just the right size to stow in my purse when I'm on the go. The battery lasts for a looong time!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Chavez

customer_reviews.title: A lot of sounds for a small guy
customer_reviews.text: This thing packs a lot of sound for something that is barely bigger than a golf ball. Has decent battery life too. Only complaint is that when it syncs to my iPhone it takes away my ability to type anything on the screen while playing.
customer_reviews.author: AZebz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker easily pairs to my phone and has an excellent sound for it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good sound.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend and she absolutely loved it! I would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! My 10
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! My 10, 9, and 6 year old all agree with me that this little sucker packs a punch - it comes with a small drawstring to loop into the ear and hang on their backpack or a hook in their room. Also comes with a usb cable to charge the speaker which I used with our regular iPhone wall charger and voila! it's perfection. Great buy, planning on gifting for others in our family as well! Go oprah!
customer_reviews.author: Leila L.

customer_reviews.title: It's super cute and has a really great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute and has a really great sound quality! It's really tiny and light weight too. It connects easily to my devices (I have a Samsung S7 and a Samsung tablet). It charges fast and has a light that indicates when it is charging.
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: a great product and delivery
customer_reviews.text: hello, this audio pet was the hit of xmas morning. it matched up perfectly and the music came out well. it is not bose quality, obviously, but for handy placement anywhere and the cuteness made a great gift. a great product and delivery
customer_reviews.author: jnaki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The teenager loved it she carries it around wherever she goes now.
customer_reviews.author: Hachi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is LOUD! And has a nice bass! I also love how when my iPhone is connected to it, it shows the battery life of my speaker. It charges fast and lasts long. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: MorganAshley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible range. Bad quality. Cute.
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad as I bought this for my child who is obsessed with musical and likes to carry it around but it does NOT reach more than 10 feet without breaking up horribly. Very disappointed, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great For Music, Odd Behavior During Streaming Shows/Movies
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine and has decent sound quality for music, but has some odd quirks when using with streamed tv shows and movies. A lot of the time, it chips off the first part of each line during dialogue. This drives me crazy and I'm hoping there is a way to fix this. I don't know what causes this.
customer_reviews.author: M. SpaldingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: ... thing is so tiny and yet the sound is wonderful. It's stupid looking but who cares
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so tiny and yet the sound is wonderful. It's stupid looking but who cares. I just hide it. I do have one issue with it. If it's not in use for just a few mins. it shuts down. Some may like that but I don't like having to get up and go over to turn it on again. It even shuts down while being charged. Why can't it just stay on once turned on? Argh!
customer_reviews.author: anne davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the conscience- a speaker on the go and a camera button. It didn’t disappoint. I use it almost everyday, easy to connect and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchild. He loves it. I’m very impressed with the sound and the battery life. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: driggert

customer_reviews.title: ... guy during the Black Friday deals and it is amazing!! I never would have thought that such ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this little guy during the Black Friday deals and it is amazing!! I never would have thought that such a tiny speaker could put out so much sound! So so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: maegan stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Music sounds like it’s in a Tin Can.☹️
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute. Sound quality, Not so much. The sound directly from the device/phone/tablet is Much better Without the cute Doggo Speaker. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: 👑

product_meta.title: My Audio Pet Mini Bluetooth Animal Wireless Speaker (Pandamonium)
product_meta.description:
Color:PandamoniumFeatures and Benefits:

- Play your favorite music anywhere.

- Connect to any Bluetooth capable device.

- 3W audio driver produces impressive, rich, clear, quality sound at volumes you wouldn’t expect from such a small package.

- Selfie feature remotely activates camera for still shots and videos, perfect for Youtubers!

- Use the included lanyard to attach to backpacks, purses, handlebars and more.

- Rechargeable lithium-ion battery that provides over 3 hours of playback.

- Compact size - Height: 1.75”(4.45CM) Width: 1.6”(4CM).

- Light weight: Only 1 3/8 ounces (40 grams).

- Choice of several designs. Heck, buy ‘em all!

- 100% satisfaction guaranteed!

- Cute and fun, fun, fun!



What’s in the Box?

1 animal Bluetooth speaker

24” USB to Mini USB charging cable

7” lanyard

Instruction booklet
feature_bullets: IMPRESSIVE, RICH, CLEAR, QUALITY SOUND and robust bass that will surprise you. The 3W audio driver packs a punch!
EASY WIRELESS CONNECTION to your smartphone, tablet, and other Bluetooth-enabled devices.
SELFIE FEATURE remotely activates camera. Perfect for Youtubers. Compact size fits anywhere. Recharge in a snap with the extended 24” USB cable.
ENJOY! These little guys are a blast! Collect them all! They make great gifts too!
100% GUARANTEE! Enjoy your new friend worry free.
